Tiger Leaping Gorge.title: Tiger Leaping Gorge
Tiger Leaping Gorge.byline: The Tiger Leaping Gorge trek (虎跳峡; Pinyin: Hǔ Tiào Xiá), near Lijiang in Yunnan, is one of the finest treks through some of the most naturally beautiful and diverse landscapes China has to offer.

Tigre.title: Tigre
Tigre.byline: Tigre is a city near Buenos Aires, in Buenos Aires province, Argentina.
